description: Navigate to Banque Alternative Suisse SA. Proceed straight along the pedestrian plaza, passing rows of red chairs on the left and a grey textured building on the right. At the end of the plaza, turn left onto the street. Continue straight, keeping the building with the large triangular facade pattern on your left and the white building on your right.
agent_refined_route: Head straight [125m] -> Turn Left -> Head straight
agent_concise_description: Proceed straight along the pedestrian plaza, passing rows of red chairs on the left and a grey textured building on the right. At the end of the plaza, turn left onto the street. Continue straight, keeping the building with the large triangular facade pattern on your left and the white building on your right.
